title: Romeo and Juliet: a film-ballet after the tragedy by Shakespeare
brief_description: Historic performance by the legendary Galina Ulanova as Juliet and Yuri Zhdanov as Romeo in a version of Prokofiev’s ballet specially choreographed and staged for filming by L. Arnshtam and Leonid Lavrovsky and featuring the Ballet and Orchestra of the Moscow Bolshoi Theatre conducted by Gennadi Rozhdestvensky. Filmed on location in the USSR with English narration.
